data.text:
Introduction to Edinburgh Airport

Edinburgh Airport – Where Scotland meets the world

Edinburgh Airport is the busiest airport in Scotland with 34 airlines flying to more than 156 destinations worldwide , such as the UK, EU, USA, Middle East, North Africa and Asia.

Up to 10x daily Transatlantic flights operate from Edinburgh Airport throughout S23.

149% Transatlantic capacity recovery in 2023

Edinburgh Airport had 11.3 million passengers in 2022 and on course for 14+ million in 2023. Passenger recovery is one of the fastest out of large UK Airports.

Edinburgh is the most well connected airport in Scotland its geographical...
